div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2303 Algiers, 1940 Burial: mid 2nd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 4 AE, 154 PL. Pot hoard Icosium (as Mazard CNNM 541-2, SNG- Cop. 678) Disposition: Service des Antiquités and Musée Stephane Gsell, Algiers (equal portions) Cantineau-Leschi, Comptes-rendus de l'Academie des Inscriptions 1941, pp. 263-77 (some illus., engravings) Mazard, CNNM, nos. 541-2
